title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for May 4
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for May 4
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl Riccadonna Chief U.S. Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the economy and markets with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "S&P 500 consumer stocks show rising speculative fervor."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
